ygData.subject: Re: Farewell
ygData.msgSnippet: KNN, REALLY wasteful....... You get magical plate, I won t yell at you, but normal steal plate arms???? Why don t you just give us less rich kakis the money???
ygData.messageBody:
KNN, REALLY wasteful....... You get magical plate, I won't yell at you, but
normal steal plate arms???? Why don't you just give us less rich kakis the
money???

Sereph Parangon, shaking her head profusely, since she only has 50 plat in her
bank.

Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:

> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> I bought 1 liao. A guy was selling it for 300pp.
> so now I totally broke again.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 01:08
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Farewell
>
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Everything you do also wasteful one......
> >
> > Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> > >
> > > eheheh. duno should buy the steel arms or not. like very wasteful...
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: whirlnuc <whirlnuc@...>
> > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > Sent: Monday, August 09, 1999 09:42
> > > Subject: [sg-everquest] Farewell
> > >
> > > > From: whirlnuc <whirlnuc@...>
> > > >
> > > > Just inform u guys tat im going for a 1 mth detachment program
> starting
> > > > tomolo. So there will be no EQ for me for a one month period. During
> > > > this time if u find me logged on, tat most likely to be my brother
> > > > playing.
> > > >
> > > > Oh yes, he has a lvl 13 ranger called Bien, just binded yesterday at
> FP.
> > > > Hope u all can guided him along as he's not as knowledgeable as me
> (Well
> > > > let me boast a bit lah).
> > > > Fesse take care of him ah and dont do anything "improper" to him :)
> > > >
> > > > And yes Garren u naughty boy , always run away from me ah, how to pay
> u
> > > > back the money!!! U know i pass the money to YY liao so get from him
> ah.
> > > > Hope by the time i come back , the debt is cleared or i go yur house
> to
> > > > paste poster and chain up yur house.
> > > >
> > > > Well tat's all folks see u all 1 mth later and once again thank all
> who
> > > > help me this pass few months .8)
> > > >
> > > > Trifrost 5th Hexes of Voodoo Circle.
> > > >
> > > > P.S Dont worry i'll bring my bear hat along to play during my
> detachment
> > > > :)
